SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tab_role_permission trp JOIN tab_permission tp ON trp.permission_id = tp.id AND tp.code=#{code} AND trp.role_id=#{rid}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tab_role_Menu trm JOIN tab_menu tm ON trm.menu_id = tm.id AND tm.code=#{code} AND trm.role_id=#{rid}
